command.name: !sht
command.desc: INFO :: Shutdowns the dedicated arma server. use: !sht N, to set a timeout before shutdown, !sht abort, to abort current shutdown, !sht info, to see how long left.

command.name: !mis
command.desc: INFO :: Show mission. Carefull with this command. an admin should be logged in if this is to be used

command.name: !res
command.desc: INFO :: Restart mission with current player slot selection

command.name: !rea
command.desc: INFO :: Restart the mission with new player slot selection

command.name: !lck
command.desc: INFO :: Unlocks the Server.

command.name: !ulck
command.desc: INFO :: Locks the server. No one will be able to join.

command.name: !mp
command.desc: INFO :: Set a maxping limit on the server. !mp 150

command.name: !cm
command.desc: INFO :: Change Mission. !cm Mission_File_Name -pbo

command.name: !bpl
command.desc: INFO :: Perm Ban a player. use !r NEW_REASON to set a cusom reason. !bpl name | !bpl name !r custom reason

command.name: !btk
command.text: Teamkilling not tolerated! Your banned until _time_
command.desc: INFO :: Ban a player for 1 hour. use !r NEW_REASON to set a cusom reason. !btk name | !btk name !r custom reason

command.name: !bst
command.text: Idiot behavior belongs elsewhere! Your banned until _time_
command.desc: INFO :: Ban a player for 10 min. use !r NEW_REASON to set a cusom reason. !bst name | !bst name !r custom reason

command.name: !kpl
command.desc: INFO :: Kick a player. use !r NEW_REASON to set a cutoms reason. !kpl name | !kpl name !r custom reason

command.name: !bid
command.desc: INFO :: Kick a player based on the BEID. use #Beclient players to get he id number. !bid BEID

command.name: !kid
command.desc: INFO :: Kick a player based on the PID. use #userlist to find the pid. !kid ID

command.name: !wrn
command.text: This is a Warning given by the admin
command.desc: INFO :: Send a warming to a player, it will increase the warncount defined in the config file. !wrn name

command.name: !ata
command.desc: INFO :: Add a temporary admin into group 4. !ata name

command.name: !rta
command.desc: INFO :: Remove temporary admin. !rta name

command.name: !mr
command.desc: INFO :: Kick N numbers of player based on join time. last joined players will get kicked.

command.name: !help
command.desc: INFO :: Show this message

command.name: !pinf
command.desc: INFO :: Show player info. Beid and join time. !pinf name

command.name: !ainf
command.desc: INFO :: Show Admins online

command.name: !upt
command.desc: INFO :: Show Server Uptime

command.name: !say
command.desc: INFO :: Send a Battleye message to all players. !say text or send a private massage !say name !text

command.name: !test
command.desc: INFO :: Test of external bat script
